EntryName	OLIG1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Oligodendrocyte transcription factor 1 (Oligo1) (Class B basic helix-loop-helix protein 6) (bHLHb6) (Class E basic helix-loop-helix protein 21) (bHLHe21)
GeneName	OLIG1 BHLHB6 BHLHE21
Length	271
Function	Promotes formation and maturation of oligodendrocytes, especially within the brain. Cooperates with OLIG2 to establish the pMN domain of the embryonic neural tube (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus
